Swallow Tabs 
Swallow Tabs is a Google Chrome extension that provides visual tools for vertical tabs. 
 
Feature 
Vertical Tabs: Swallow Tabs allows users to view and manage their browser tabs vertically, which makes it easier to navigate between multiple tabs. 
 
Visualization tools: Swallow Tabs provides an intuitive user interface that allows users to clearly see all open tabs and reorder them by dragging and dropping them. 
 
Easy to manage: Users can close tabs with a right-click menu or shortcut, and can quickly find specific tabs with a search function. 
 
 
Use 
After installing the Swallow Tabs extension, click the Swallow Tabs icon in the upper right corner of the browser to open the vertical tabs interface. 
In the open screen, you can see all the open tabs, you can drag and drop to reorder them, and you can close tabs by using the right-click menu or shortcut keys. 
If you want to find a specific tab, you can use the search function, enter what you're looking for, and the matching tabs will be highlighted. 
Developer 
Swallow Tabs is developed and maintained by [ZhengXue Huang]. You can reach him on Twitter [@huangonetwo].
